DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety , tolerability , immunogenicity 13-valent pneumococcal conjugate ( 13vPnC ) vaccine healthy Japanese adult age > = 50 year .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating 13-valent Pneumococcal Conjugate Vaccine Healthy Japanese Adults Aged > = 50 Years
